description:
### Context

All Data, FIW 2013-2021
"Freedom in the World is the most widely read and cited report of its kind, tracking global trends in political rights and civil liberties for more than 40 years. "

https://freedomhouse.org/report/freedom-world


### Content

"The Freedom in the World report is composed of numerical ratings and supporting descriptive texts for 195 countries and 15 territories.
For each country and territory, Freedom in the World analyzes the electoral process, political pluralism and participation, the functioning of the government, freedom of expression and of belief, associational and organizational rights, the rule of law, and personal autonomy and individual rights."


### Acknowledgements

https://freedomhouse.org/report/freedom-world


### Inspiration

"Nelson Mandela, a legacy of Freedom: On February 11, 1990, Nelson Mandela left prison a free man. After spending 27 years behind bars, the South African icon had hoped to see his country become a model for Africa. Instead, xenophobia has marred that dream. "
https://www.dw.com/en/nelson-mandela-a-legacy-of-freedom/g-52327905

"For Gandhi, Freedom of the Individual Was the First and Last Goal. Gandhi believed that real swaraj would come “not by the acquisition of authority by a few, but by the acquisition of the capacity by all to resist authority when abused"
https://thewire.in/books/reading-gandhi-excerpt#:~:text=books-,For%20Gandhi%2C%20Freedom%20of%20the%20Individual%20Was%20the%20First%20and,to%20resist%20authority%20when%20abused%E2%80%9D.

Dalai Lama : "Let us widen our perspective to include the well being of the whole world and its future generations in our vision of prosperity and freedom."
https://www.dalailama.com/messages/world-peace/human-rights-democracy-and-freedom
title: Freedom In the World 2013-2021
